**Literacy:**

-   [**Letters and Sounds**: Recognizing and writing the letters of the alphabet, and understanding their associated sounds](https://www.parents.com/kids/education/elementary-school/your-kid-will-learn-in-kindergarten/)[1](https://www.parents.com/kids/education/elementary-school/your-kid-will-learn-in-kindergarten/).
-   [**Reading**: Beginning to read simple words and sentences, and expanding vocabulary](https://www.parents.com/kids/education/elementary-school/your-kid-will-learn-in-kindergarten/)[1](https://www.parents.com/kids/education/elementary-school/your-kid-will-learn-in-kindergarten/).
-   [**Writing**: Writing letters, simple words, and starting to write sentences](https://www.bing.com/aclick?ld=e8wEkdi9TXoZ5yVvJPLbbIhjVUCUxWpAtMUHZRFrwf6RV29vaOV0ghe9Yb1oSMXVpP1fVmYs5PhbzB4XtGNxm327vLVzoks20596jhkoZDtrILIyidO-WIDm6LkIO7iIyAAJTY6AOA1s1WSkddhwhSlFWSjgjFiPP6JSsZA8mMw467kp7K&&rlid=f5422861e2bf114c7a124ede623a5f59)[1](https://www.parents.com/kids/education/elementary-school/your-kid-will-learn-in-kindergarten/).

**Mathematics:**

-   [**Counting**: Counting to at least 30 and recognizing numbers 0-30](https://www.parents.com/kids/education/elementary-school/your-kid-will-learn-in-kindergarten/)[1](https://www.parents.com/kids/education/elementary-school/your-kid-will-learn-in-kindergarten/).
-   [**Shapes**: Identifying and describing common shapes](https://www.parents.com/kids/education/elementary-school/your-kid-will-learn-in-kindergarten/)[1](https://www.parents.com/kids/education/elementary-school/your-kid-will-learn-in-kindergarten/).
-   [**Basic Operations**: Understanding and performing basic single-digit addition and subtraction](https://www.parents.com/kids/education/elementary-school/your-kid-will-learn-in-kindergarten/)[1](https://www.parents.com/kids/education/elementary-school/your-kid-will-learn-in-kindergarten/).

**Social Studies and Science:**

-   [**Exploration**: Engaging in activities that introduce basic concepts of the world, including science and social studies](https://www.splashlearn.com/blog/kindergarten-curriculum-what-is-taught-to-kids-in-kindergarten/)[2](https://www.splashlearn.com/blog/kindergarten-curriculum-what-is-taught-to-kids-in-kindergarten/).

**Social Skills:**

-   **Cooperation**: Learning to share, take turns, and work in groups.
-   **Classroom Behavior**: Following rules, routines, and understanding the importance of classroom behavior.

**Physical Development:**

-   **Gross Motor Skills**: Participating in physical activities that develop coordination and balance.
-   **Fine Motor Skills**: Developing the ability to handle small objects, use art tools, and begin writing.

**Emotional and Personal Development:**

-   **Self-Regulation**: Understanding and managing emotions.
-   **Independence**: Performing tasks like dressing and using the restroom without assistance.
